title: Billy The Kid
description: A new take on Billy the Kid, American outlaw and gunfighter of the Old West.
quote: Now, why is it when most folks see me, they just see some funny little kid?
altHero: Billy the Kid smoking a cigarette in front of a burning house
alt1: Billy the Kid cackling and spinning a gun on his finger
alt2: Christiana Dior speaks to Billy the Kid
alt3: Chad Luxt walks out of a house
alt4: Billy on the ground near a broken window
